MedicineBox.name: MedicineBox
MedicineBox.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Enhanced attribute

<font color=#000000 size=18>heal up to <font color=#00ff00 size=18>{dhp} <font color=#000000 size=18>damage when you leave a floor</font>

Hawkeye.name: Hawkeye
Hawkeye.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Enhanced attribute

<font color=#000000 size=18>Mark a monster with a key at the beginning of each level</font>

Endurance.name: Endurance
Endurance.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Enhanced attribute

<font color=#000000 size=18>Increase <font color=#00ff00 size=18>{dMaxHp} <font color=#000000 size=18> max hp</font>

Power.name: Power
Power.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Enhanced attribute

<font color=#000000 size=18>Attack power <font color=#00ff00 size=18>+{dPower} <font color=#000000 size=18></font>

Fierce.name: Fierce
Fierce.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Enhanced attribute

<font color=#000000 size=18>Critical strike rate <font color=#00ff00 size=18>{dSneakCritical} <font color=#000000 size=18></font>

Cloak.name: Cloak
Cloak.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Enhanced attribute

<font color=#000000 size=18>Immune sneak attack once</font>

Unback2Sneak.name: Unback2Sneak
Unback2Sneak.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Enhanced attribute

<font color=#000000 size=18>Will not be countered when attacking the marked monster</font>

TimeMachine.name: TimeMachine
TimeMachine.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Enhanced attribute

<font color=#000000 size=18>Leaving this floor, Death returns {deathGodBackStep} rounds</font>

Key.name: Key
Key.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Open treasure chest or door</font>

Door.name: Door
Door.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Open to the next floor</font>

TreasureBox.name: TreasureBox
TreasureBox.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Can be opened by a key to produce random props</font>

HpCapsule.name: HpCapsule
HpCapsule.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Reply per turn<font color=#00ff00 size=18>{heal} <font color=#000000 size=18>Lasts 5 rounds</font>

Magazine.name: Magazine
Magazine.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>1 experience value per click</font>

Shield.name: Shield
Shield.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Resist an attack damage, Cooling time 3 rounds</font>

HeadBone.name: HeadBone
HeadBone.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>When attacked by a monster, the resurrection is the king</font>

DeathGod.name: DeathGod
DeathGod.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Float

<font color=#000000 size=18>Move position every turn;<font color=#3333cc size=20>Killing <font color=#3333cc size=20>Attack every turn</font>

NormalZombie.name: NormalZombie
NormalZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Dull

<font color=#000000 size=18>No special ability<font>

GoblinThief.name: GoblinThief
GoblinThief.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Thief

<font color=#000000 size=18>Stealing {percent}% of gold coins during a raid<font>

HoundZombie.name: HoundZombie
HoundZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Dead virus

<font color=#000000 size=18>attack with two layers poisoning<font>

Vampire.name: Vampire
Vampire.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Bloodsucking

<font color=#000000 size=18>Absorb {percent}% of current health during a raid<font>

DancerZombie.name: DancerZombie
DancerZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Dance

<font color=#000000 size=18>umming 2 companions during a raid<font>

GluttonyZombie.name: GluttonyZombie
GluttonyZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Hunger

<font color=#000000 size=18>Swallow 1 random item during the raid<font>

Gengar.name: Gengar
Gengar.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Ambush

<font color=#000000 size=18>Take an attack when leaving this layer<font>

BombAbomination.name: BombAbomination
BombAbomination.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Self-destruct

<font color=#000000 size=18>Self-exploded after {cnt} round, causing {mult} times attack damage<font>

EyeDemon.name: EyeDemon
EyeDemon.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Perspective

<font color=#000000 size=18>Explore 2 empty squares when it die;<font>

RandomEggZombie.name: RandomEggZombie
RandomEggZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Capsule

<font color=#000000 size=18>Death must drop the capsule<font>

LustZombie.name: LustZombie
LustZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Allure

<font color=#000000 size=18>15 rounds in advance of the raid<font>

IronZombie.name: IronZombie
IronZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Armor

<font color=#000000 size=18>Has {sheild} point armor<font>

CommanderZombie.name: CommanderZombie
CommanderZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Command

<font color=#000000 size=18>All other monster attacks and health doubled during the game<font>

RageZombie.name: RageZombie
RageZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Rage

<font color=#000000 size=18>The lower the health, the higher the attack power<font>

HideZombie.name: HideZombie
HideZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Hide

<font color=#000000 size=18>Hidden to other vacancies after appearing<font>

GuardZombie.name: GuardZombie
GuardZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Guard

<font color=#000000 size=18>When other monsters in the nearby 8 are attacked, they take damage<font>

ReviveZombie.name: ReviveZombie
ReviveZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Revive

<font color=#000000 size=18>Can be revived once after death<font>

CowardZombie.name: CowardZombie
CowardZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Coward

<font color=#000000 size=18>If other zombies die, they will escape into the shadows<font>

MarkZombie.name: MarkZombie
MarkZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Mark

<font color=#000000 size=18>Every time you get hurt, you will mark a random monster<font>

GreedyZombie.name: GreedyZombie
GreedyZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Greedy

<font color=#000000 size=18>Pick up the surrounding props and coins<font>

ConfusionZombie.name: ConfusionZombie
ConfusionZombie.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Foggy

<font color=#000000 size=18The surrounding squares will be displayed as question marks<font>

Mummy.name: Mummy
Mummy.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Sand dust

<font color=#000000 size=18>Making fog around you<font>

PoisonJellyfish.name: PoisonJellyfish
PoisonJellyfish.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Poisonous fog

</color><font color=#000000 size=18>Bring all unopened squares to death when it die</font>

SkeletonKing.name: SkeletonKing
SkeletonKing.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Athanasy

<font color=#000000 size=18>After the death, the skull will stay in place, and will be revived whenever there is a zombie raid<font>

BoxMonster.name: BoxMonster
BoxMonster.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Anger

<font color=#000000 size=18>Treasure of the treasure chest<font>

ShopNpc.name: ShopNpc
ShopNpc.desc:
<font color=#3333cc size=20>Shop

<font color=#000000 size=18>Sell all kinds of props here;<font>

HpPotion.name: HpPotion
HpPotion.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Gain<font color=#00ff00 size=18>{dhp} <font color=#000000 size=18>hp</font>

Apple.name: Apple
Apple.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Gain<font color=#00ff00 size=18>{dhp} <font color=#000000 size=18>hp</font>

Steak.name: Steak
Steak.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Gain<font color=#00ff00 size=18>{dhp} <font color=#000000 size=18>hp</font>

IceBlock.name: IceBlock
IceBlock.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Can be broken and disappear</font>

Knife.name: Knife
Knife.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Throw a weapon, dealing <font color=#00ff00 size=18>{power} <font color=#000000 size=18>damage</font>

RayGun.name: RayGun
RayGun.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Ignite the target after shooting, dealing <font color=#00ff00 size=18>{power} <font color=#000000 size=18>damage</font>

Cocoon.name: Cocoon
Cocoon.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>Wrapped items cannot be used</font>

MedicineBox.name: 医药箱
MedicineBox.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>离开每层时回复<font color=#00ff00 size=18>{dhp} <font color=#000000 size=18>生命

Hawkeye.name: 鹰眼
Hawkeye.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>每关开始时标记一个带钥匙的怪物

Endurance.name: 耐力
Endurance.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>耐力：增加<font color=#00ff00 size=18>{dMaxHp} <font color=#000000 size=18>最大生命值

Unback2Sneak.name: 先动
Unback2Sneak.desc: <font color=#000000 size=18>攻击被标记的怪物时不会被反击
